channel.title: Installing Visual Studio :: Data Structures in C#
channel.description: Installing Visual Studio Visual Studio Community 2022 is available on the machines we use for CIS 300 labs, as well as on machines in other lab classrooms. Students can also access Visual Studio via a remote desktop server â€” see the CS Department Support Wiki for details. This edition of Visual Studio is also freely available for installation on your own PC for your personal and classroom use. This section provides instructions for obtaining this software from Microsoft and installing it on your PC.
